attributes.action: Make non recyclable plastic illegal. To be phased out in Five years.
attributes.additional_details:
The majority of plastic is landfilled.
Drive anywhere and you see plastic waste by the roadside. It needs to stop.
attributes.background: To stop most plastics being landfilled, they should all be recyclable. To stop micro plastics entering the food chains.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Make it illegal to manufacture or sell products using non-recyclable plastic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561894
